fullplot: On a remote island, the FBI has a training program for their psychological profiling division, called "Mindhunters", used to track down serial killers. The training goes horribly wrong, however, when a group of seven young agents discover that one of them is a serial killer, and is setting about slaying the others. Can the few that are left figure out who the killer is in time?
plot: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.
title: Mindhunters

tomatoes.consensus: A retread of Ten Little Indians that lacks the source material's wit.
